.class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection extends System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase

span.span: Represents a collection of objects.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用 类可循环访问对象的集合 。Use the class to iterate through a collection of objects. 您可以使用属性或属性访问此对象集合 。You can access this collection of objects using the property or the property. 类还用于创建扩展类的自定义类型 。The class is also used in the creation of custom types that extend the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类。The following code example shows how to use the class. /configSections> ```
